body:
Can we have a announcement so we know that player is punished like for example
a staff is online and he or she sees a player breaking the rules so when that staff member is punishing him or her it announces it like this

[Staff Member] kicked [Player] Reason:
Better example (Im using jozz and i as an example NOT REAL XD )

jozzmcozz kicked DarkArcher810 Reason: To Happy
body_tagged:
Can we have a announcement so we know that player is punished like for example
a staff is online and he or she sees a player breaking the rules so when that staff member is punishing him or her it announces it like this

[Staff Member] kicked [Player] Reason:
Better example (Im using jozz and i as an example NOT REAL XD )

jozzmcozz kicked DarkArcher810 Reason: To Happy
title: Public Announcements on Player reports

replies.body:
yeah then we can know if your report was dealt with or not
+1
replies.body_tagged:
yeah then we can know if your report was dealt with or not
+1

replies.body: Yeah, this really needs to be implemented. I feel like all these random people spam "*so and so* IS A HACKER!!!!!!" 10 minutes after that person got banned/kicked... Maybe that's just me, but it really seems like that's what happens if a mod doesn't speak up. Also, I'd personally like to thank all mods for all the volunteer work they do to keep the server fun and clean. You're awesome :3
replies.body_tagged: Yeah, this really needs to be implemented. I feel like all these random people spam "*so and so* IS A HACKER!!!!!!" 10 minutes after that person got banned/kicked... Maybe that's just me, but it really seems like that's what happens if a mod doesn't speak up. Also, I'd personally like to thank all mods for all the volunteer work they do to keep the server fun and clean. You're awesome :3

replies.body:
It'd be funny if the messages were random :P

Ban: (would be said only in that certian game)
steven5703's sad fait was decided after PeachyYas banned him for Hacking.
steven5703 is no more. Banned by PeachyYas for Hacking.
steven5703 saw it coming. Banned by PeachyYas for Hacking.
steven5703 was banned by PeachyYas for Hacking. Be  gone, rule breakers!
Tempban: (only said to players in the game)
steven5703 was shot dead by PeachyYas for Hacking. Ban expires in: **.
steven5703 was frozen in ice by PeachyYas for hacking. Ice will melt in: **.
steven5703 was tempbanned by PeachyYas for hacking. Expires in: **.
Kick: (only said to players in the game)
steven5703 was kicked by PeachyYas for Hacking.
steven5703's butt was kicked by PeachyYas for Hacking.
steven5703 was shot to the moon by PeachyYas's kick for Hacking.
Forum ban: (broadcasted to the entire network)
steven5703's social communications was revoked by PeachyYas. Reason: Hacking.
steven5703 was removed from the community forum by PeachyYas for Hacking.
steven5703 was forumbanned by PeachyYas. Reason: Hacking.
